Package au.edu.anu.ymuit.ui.colour

package au.edu.anu.ymuit.ui.colour

A means of constructing colour palettes of three bands (Band) using liner functions (Function). Each palette is listed in PaletteTypes enum class which references a PaletteFactory. The PaletteFactory constructs palettes that have proved useful for displays of 2-dimensional data (i.e maps etc).

Author:
Ian Davies, 28 Nov 2018
